root.name: Thor: God of Thunder
root.description: Overview Chris Hemsworth who plays Thor and Tom Hiddleston who plays Loki are confirmed to reprise their roles from the film by lending their voices and likenesses to the game. Matt Fraction the current writer of the Thor comic book will be the co-writer of the game to help expand on the Thor universe and the ideas presented in the movie. This is the first Thor only game.
